    • Constructor Detail

      • AirportSystem

        public AirportSystem(java.lang.String name,
                     boolean enable)
        Initializes the AirportSystem.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the airport, used for checking if a flight will be landing.
        enable - boolean to see if landings will be enabled. Currently unused.

    • Method Detail

      • runwayValid

        public boolean runwayValid(java.lang.String runName)
        Checks if the named Runway exists in the AirportSystem.
        Parameters:
        runName - name of the Runway to find.
        Returns:
        boolean of if the Runway exists.

      • removeRunwayDeparture

        public Plane removeRunwayDeparture(java.lang.String runName)
                            throws AirportException
        Removes the next Departure from a Runway of runName, and also removes it from the log of activeFlight numbers.
        Parameters:
        runName - name of the Runway to find.
        Returns:
        p the next plane in the departure Queue.
        Throws:
        AirportException - if something goes wrong while removing.

      • removeRunwayArrival

        public Plane removeRunwayArrival(java.lang.String runName)
                          throws AirportException
        Removes the next Arrival from a Runway of runName, and also removes it from the log of activeFlight numbers.
        Parameters:
        runName - name of the Runway to find.
        Returns:
        p the next plane in the arrival Queue.
        Throws:
        AirportException - if something goes wrong while removing.

      • waitIsEmpty

        public boolean waitIsEmpty()
        Returns if the waiting List is empty.
        Returns:
        b the state of the waiting List.

      • getWaiting

        public ListRAB<Plane> getWaiting()
        Returns the waitlist for direct modification (required by Driver.removeRunway().)
        Returns:
        l the List of all currently waiting Planes.

      • waitValid

        public boolean waitValid(java.lang.String flightName)
        Returns whether the flightNumber is in the waiting List.
        Parameters:
        flightName - a String of the flightNumber being searched for.
        Returns:
        b a boolean of whether the flightName is present in the waiting List.

      • addRunway

        public void addRunway(java.lang.String runName)
        Adds a Runway of name runName.
        Parameters:
        runName - the name of the new Runway to make.

      • removeRunway

        public void removeRunway(java.lang.String runName)
                  throws AirportException
        Removes a Runway of name runName.
        Parameters:
        runName - the name of the Runway to remove.
        Throws:
        AirportException - if the runway is not found.

      • getRunway

        public Runway getRunway(java.lang.String runName)
        Returns the specified Runway for direct modification (required by Driver.removeRunway().)
        Parameters:
        runName - the name of the runway to find.
        Returns:
        the Runway identified.

      • peekNextPlane

        public Plane peekNextPlane(boolean isTakeoff)
                    throws AirportException,
                           java.lang.Exception
        Returns the next Plane that will be processed, without incrementing the counter.
        Parameters:
        isTakeoff - boolean selecting if we are searching for a takeoff or landing operation.
        Returns:
        the Plane identified.
        Throws:
        AirportException - if there are no planes on any runway.
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong in the airport.

      • getNextPlane

        public Plane getNextPlane(boolean isTakeoff)
                   throws AirportException
        Returns the next Plane that will be processed, and increments the counter.
        Parameters:
        isTakeoff - boolean selecting if we are searching for a takeoff or landing operation.
        Returns:
        the Plane identified.
        Throws:
        AirportException - if something goes wrong while removing.

      • reenter

        public void reenter(java.lang.String flightNum)
             throws AirportException,
                    java.lang.Exception
        Moves the designated flightNum from the waiting List to its Runway.
        Parameters:
        flightNum - the name of the flight to add.
        Throws:
        AirportException - if the specified plane is not within the waiting list.
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong within the airport.

      • addPlane

        public void addPlane(Plane airplane)
              throws AirportException,
                     java.lang.Exception
        Adds the designated Plane to its Runway.
        Parameters:
        airplane - the Plane to add.
        Throws:
        AirportException - if the runway isn't found or if there is an identical plane.
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong within the airport.

      • processPlane

        public void processPlane(boolean isTakeoff,
                         boolean allow)
                  throws AirportException
        Removes the designated Plane from its Runway, either to delete or to add to the waitlist.
        Parameters:
        isTakeoff - is this a departure or arrival.
        allow - will it complete the action or move to the waitlist.
        Throws:
        AirportException - if no planes are able to proceed.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the airport name.
        Returns:
        the String of the airport name

        public int getTakeoffs()
        Returns the number of takeoffs.
        Returns:
        the int of total takeoffs

      • getLandings

        public int getLandings()
        Returns the number of landings.
        Returns:
        the int of total landings

      • displayTakeoff

        public java.lang.String displayTakeoff()
        Returns info about the Planes trying to take off.
        Returns:
        the String of each Plane trying to take off, by Runway

      • displayLanding

        public java.lang.String displayLanding()
        Returns info about the Planes trying to land.
        Returns:
        the String of each Plane trying to land, by Runway

      • displayWaiting

        public java.lang.String displayWaiting()
        Returns info about the Planes waiting to be sent back to a Runway.
        Returns:
        the String of each Plane in the waiting List
